verses.name: 2 Chronicles 33:4
verses.text: Also he built altars in the house of the Lord, whereof the Lord had said, In Jerusalem shall my name be for ever.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 33:5
verses.text: And he built altars for all the host of heaven in the two courts of the house of the Lord.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 33:6
verses.text: And he caused his children to pass through the fire in the valley of the son of Hinnom: also he observed times, and used enchantments, and used witchcraft, and dealt with a familiar spirit, and with wizards: he wrought much evil in the sight of the Lord, to provoke him to anger.
